name: United Corporations Limited 2nd Pref.1963 Series
longDescription: United Corporation is an international energy services provider operating as a specialist Procurement Services organisation to the Oil, Gas and Petro-chemical industries. Based in the UK, United Corporation is a cost effective Supply and Logistical resource providing a bespoke procurement service. Our dedicated team provides effective management of your requirements. The company specialises in the supply of equipment, process plant, machinery and refinery spares to the oil and gas industry.We have long term experience in supplying and supporting major oil and gas operating companies in the Persian Gulf. Working from client enquiries and specifications we identify, sources and ship equipment and materials to designated job sites. Our services cover the whole spectrum of supply chain operations including a full track and trace warehousing, consolidation and distribution service.
fulldescription: United Corporation is an international energy services provider operating as a specialist Procurement Services organisation to the Oil, Gas and Petro-chemical industries. Based in the UK, United Corporation is a cost effective Supply and Logistical resource providing a bespoke procurement service. Our dedicated team provides effective management of your requirements. The company specialises in the supply of equipment, process plant, machinery and refinery spares to the oil and gas industry.We have long term experience in supplying and supporting major oil and gas operating companies in the Persian Gulf. Working from client enquiries and specifications we identify, sources and ship equipment and materials to designated job sites. Our services cover the whole spectrum of supply chain operations including a full track and trace warehousing, consolidation and distribution service. High level purchasing expertise and experience in the international supply industry places using a strong position to provide quality products at competitive prices. United Corporation has achieved a marked success in its services operations and we pride ourselves in the continued development and expansion derived, we consider, from the attention to detail and the ability to respond effectively and efficiently to client needs and requests.
fullAddress: 165 University Avenue,10th Floor, Toronto, ON, CA
